settings.title: Climb the Mountain
settings.author: Bing
settings.description: A text adventure game where you have to climb a mountain full of challenges and surprises.

scenes.text: You are an average guy who lives in a small town. You have always dreamed of climbing the highest mountain in the world, Mount Everest. You have saved enough money to join an expedition that will take you to the base camp of the mountain. You pack your bags and board a plane to Nepal.

choices.text: Change your mind and go back home.

scenes.animationCode: var image = new THREE.TextureLoader().load('start.jpg'); var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(10, 32, 32); var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map: image, side: THREE.BackSide}); var skybox = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material); ascene.add(skybox); skybox.position.set(0, 0, 0); var angle = 0; requestAnimationFrame(function animateSkybox() {angle += Math.PI /360; skybox.rotation.y = angle; render(); requestAnimationFrame(animateSkybox);});

scenes.text: You arrive in Nepal and meet your guide, a friendly Sherpa named Tenzing. He takes you to a hotel where you will stay for a few days to acclimatize to the altitude. He tells you about the route and the dangers of climbing Mount Everest.
scenes.animationCode: var image = new THREE.TextureLoader().load('nepal.jpg'); var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(10, 32, 32); var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map: image, side: THREE.BackSide}); var skybox = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material); ascene.add(skybox); skybox.position.set(0, 0, 0); var angle = 0; requestAnimationFrame(function animateSkybox() {angle += Math.PI /360; skybox.rotation.y = angle; render(); requestAnimationFrame(animateSkybox);});

scenes.text: You change your mind and decide to go back home. You realize that climbing Mount Everest is too risky and too expensive for you. You feel disappointed and ashamed of yourself.
scenes.animationCode: var image = new THREE.TextureLoader().load('home.jpg'); var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(10, 32, 32); var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map: image, side: THREE.BackSide}); var skybox = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material); ascene.add(skybox); skybox.position.set(0, 0, 0); var angle = 0; requestAnimationFrame(function animateSkybox() {angle += Math.PI /360; skybox.rotation.y = angle; render(); requestAnimationFrame(animateSkybox);});

scenes.text: You listen to Tenzing as he tells you about the route and the dangers of climbing Mount Everest. He says that you will have to cross glaciers, crevasses, icefalls, avalanches, and storms. He also says that you will have to deal with low oxygen levels, extreme cold, fatigue, and altitude sickness. He warns you that many people have died trying to reach the summit of the mountain.
scenes.animationCode: var image = new THREE.TextureLoader().load('listen.jpg'); var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(10, 32, 32); var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map: image, side: THREE.BackSide}); var skybox = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material); ascene.add(skybox); skybox.position.set(0, 0, 0); var angle = 0; requestAnimationFrame(function animateSkybox() {angle += Math.PI /360; skybox.rotation.y = angle; render(); requestAnimationFrame(animateSkybox);});

scenes.text: You ignore Tenzing as he tells you about the route and the dangers of climbing Mount Everest. You think that he is exaggerating and trying to scare you. You think that you are strong enough and brave enough to conquer the mountain. You tell him that you are ready to go.
scenes.animationCode: var image = new THREE.TextureLoader().load('ignore.jpg'); var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(10, 32, 32); var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map: image, side: THREE.BackSide}); var skybox = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material); ascene.add(skybox); skybox.position.set(0, 0, 0); var angle = 0; requestAnimationFrame(function animateSkybox() {angle += Math.PI /360; skybox.rotation.y = angle; render(); requestAnimationFrame(animateSkybox);});

scenes.text: You ask Tenzing more questions about climbing Mount Everest. He answers them patiently and gives you some tips and advice. He tells you to drink plenty of water, eat high-calorie food, wear warm clothes, use sunscreen, follow his instructions, and stay positive.

choices.text: Tell him you know better than him.

scenes.animationCode: var image = new THREE.TextureLoader().load('questions.jpg'); var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(10, 32, 32); var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map: image, side: THREE.BackSide}); var skybox = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material); ascene.add(skybox); skybox.position.set(0, 0, 0); var angle = 0; requestAnimationFrame(function animateSkybox() {angle += Math.PI /360; skybox.rotation.y = angle; render(); requestAnimationFrame(animateSkybox);});

scenes.text: You tell Tenzing that you are ready to go to the base camp of Mount Everest. He smiles and nods. He says that he is glad that you are eager and confident. He says that he hopes that you will enjoy the journey and reach the summit safely.
scenes.animationCode: var image = new THREE.TextureLoader().load('ready.jpg'); var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(10, 32, 32); var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map: image, side: THREE.BackSide}); var skybox = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material); ascene.add(skybox); skybox.position.set(0, 0, 0); var angle = 0; requestAnimationFrame(function animateSkybox() {angle += Math.PI /360; skybox.rotation.y = angle; render(); requestAnimationFrame(animateSkybox);});

scenes.text: You thank Tenzing for his help and guidance. He smiles and says that he is happy to help you. He says that he likes your attitude and curiosity. He says that he thinks that you have a good chance of succeeding in your goal.
scenes.animationCode: var image = new THREE.TextureLoader().load('thank.jpg'); var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(10, 32, 32); var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map: image, side: THREE.BackSide}); var skybox = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material); ascene.add(skybox); skybox.position.set(0, 0, 0); var angle = 0; requestAnimationFrame(function animateSkybox() {angle += Math.PI /360; skybox.rotation.y = angle; render(); requestAnimationFrame(animateSkybox);});

scenes.text: You tell Tenzing that you know better than him about climbing Mount Everest. You say that you have read many books and watched many videos about it. You say that you don't need his tips and advice. You say that you are smarter and stronger than him.
scenes.animationCode: var image = new THREE.TextureLoader().load('knowbetter.jpg'); var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(10, 32, 32); var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map: image, side: THREE.BackSide}); var skybox = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material); ascene.add(skybox); skybox.position.set(0, 0, 0); var angle = 0; requestAnimationFrame(function animateSkybox() {angle += Math.PI /360; skybox.rotation.y = angle; render(); requestAnimationFrame(animateSkybox);});

scenes.text: You and Tenzing take a bus to the town of Lukla, where you board a small plane to the village of Namche Bazaar. From there, you trek for several days to the base camp of Mount Everest. Along the way, you see beautiful scenery and meet friendly people. You also encounter some difficulties, such as steep slopes, rough trails, and thin air.
scenes.animationCode: var image = new THREE.TextureLoader().load('basecamp.jpg'); var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(10, 32, 32); var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map: image, side: THREE.BackSide}); var skybox = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material); ascene.add(skybox); skybox.position.set(0, 0, 0); var angle = 0; requestAnimationFrame(function animateSkybox() {angle += Math.PI /360; skybox.rotation.y = angle; render(); requestAnimationFrame(animateSkybox);});

scenes.text: You reach the base camp of Mount Everest. You feel proud and excited. You see many tents and people from different countries. You also see a huge wall of ice and snow that is the beginning of the climb to the summit. Tenzing tells you that you will have to wait for a few days until the weather is clear and stable.
scenes.animationCode: var image = new THREE.TextureLoader().load('reach.jpg'); var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(10, 32, 32); var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map: image, side: THREE.BackSide}); var skybox = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material); ascene.add(skybox); skybox.position.set(0, 0, 0); var angle = 0; requestAnimationFrame(function animateSkybox() {angle += Math.PI /360; skybox.rotation.y = angle; render(); requestAnimationFrame(animateSkybox);});

scenes.text: You give up and decide to go back to Nepal. You realize that climbing Mount Everest is too hard and too dangerous for you. You feel disappointed and ashamed of yourself.
scenes.animationCode: var image = new THREE.TextureLoader().load('giveup.jpg'); var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(10, 32, 32); var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map: image, side: THREE.BackSide}); var skybox = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material); ascene.add(skybox); skybox.position.set(0, 0, 0); var angle = 0; requestAnimationFrame(function animateSkybox() {angle += Math.PI /360; skybox.rotation.y = angle; render(); requestAnimationFrame(animateSkybox);});

scenes.text: You wait for the weather to clear up at the base camp. You spend your time resting, eating, drinking, talking to other climbers, and preparing your gear. You also check the weather forecast every day. After a week of waiting, you finally see a window of opportunity to start climbing.
scenes.animationCode: var image = new THREE.TextureLoader().load('wait.jpg'); var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(10, 32, 32); var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map: image, side: THREE.BackSide}); var skybox = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material); ascene.add(skybox); skybox.position.set(0, 0, 0); var angle = 0; requestAnimationFrame(function animateSkybox() {angle += Math.PI /360; skybox.rotation.y = angle; render(); requestAnimationFrame(animateSkybox);});

scenes.text: You start climbing Mount Everest with Tenzing and a few other climbers. You follow a series of camps that are set up along the way. You face many challenges and dangers as you ascend higher and higher. You have to cross the Khumbu Icefall, a maze of ice blocks and crevasses that can collapse at any moment. You have to climb the Lhotse Face, a steep slope of ice and rock that requires fixed ropes and crampons. You have to traverse the South Col, a windy passageway that connects two peaks. You have to scale the Hillary Step, a vertical rock wall that is the last obstacle before the summit.
scenes.animationCode: var image = new THREE.TextureLoader().load('climb.jpg'); var geometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(10, 32, 32); var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map: image, side: THREE.BackSide}); var skybox = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material); ascene.add(skybox); skybox.position.set(0, 0, 0); var angle = 0; requestAnimationFrame(function animateSkybox() {angle += Math.PI /360; skybox.rotation.y = angle; render(); requestAnimationFrame(animateSkybox);});

scenes.text: You reach the summit of Mount Everest. You feel an incredible sense of achievement and joy. You see a breathtaking view of the world below you. You take some pictures and plant a flag on the top of the mountain. You hug Tenzing and thank him for his help. He congratulates you and says that you are a great climber.
